Package com.ibm.streams.management.domain

Interface SecurityPropertiesMXBean

public interface SecurityPropertiesMXBean
SecurityPropertiesMXBean provides attributes, operations, and notifications for working with Streams security properties.

ObjectNameBuilder.domainPropertyGroup(String, com.ibm.streams.management.domain.DomainMXBean.PropertyGroup) can be used with a groupName of SECURITY to build the ObjectName for a SecurityPropertiesMXBean.

Notifications:
A SecurityPropertiesMXBean supports sending the following notifications:

javax.management.AttributeChangeNotification.ATTRIBUTE_CHANGE
Only a subset of the attributes support attribute change notification. A note is included in the attribute description for each attribute that supports attribute change notification

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    SecurityPropertiesMXBean.AuthenticationType
    Enumeration for the scheme used to authenticate Streams users.
    static enum 
    SecurityPropertiesMXBean.RevocationMethod
    Enumeration for the method used for checking whether a certificate has been revoked.

  • Method Details

    • getAuthenticationType

      SecurityPropertiesMXBean.AuthenticationType getAuthenticationType()
      Returns the value of the SECURITY_AUTHENTICATION_TYPE configuration property.
      Returns:
      the scheme used to authenticate users.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getCertificateUserRegularExpression

      String getCertificateUserRegularExpression()
      Returns the value of the SECURITY_CERTIFICATE_USER_REGULAR_EXPRESSION configuration property.

      Note: Attribute change notification is supported for this attribute.

      Returns:
      the format of the certificate distinguished name.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • setCertificateUserRegularExpression

      void setCertificateUserRegularExpression(String regularExpression)
      Sets the value of the SECURITY_CERTIFICATE_USER_REGULAR_EXPRESSION configuration property.
      Parameters:
      regularExpression - specifies the new certificate distinguished name format to set.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.
